extendedInfo.description: Bob Burnquist's Dreamland is a skateboarding and adventure game that brings the skateboarder Bob Burnquist as the main character. The game showcases real life signature tricks from Bob illustrated in a cartoon like world. With a simple gameplay that is incredibly fun, the game introduces scenes and backgrounds inspired by the real Dreamland: Bobâs own Backyard. All the individual obstacle blocks were designed by Bob, which will allow the player to make a Dream Journey into the mind of one of the best and most creative skateboarders of all time.The main objective of the game is to complete each level with the best performance possible. The player will be evaluated by each level completed, and the more tricks, combos, collection of items and height in jumps, the better the final score. There are 3 different levels of evaluation. Sweet! , Rad! and Awesome! .A lot more is yet to come in the coming months: Updates bringing you new ramp designs, tricks, environment and other changes for more fun and entertainment to the fans of the game around the World.Highlights:â¢ A simple gesture on the screen in any direction will be enough to perform any trick â¨â¢ Includes Bob Burnquist signature tricks like the fakie to fakie 900, Front flips and many more â¨â¨â¢ And just like Bob, it will be possible to land your tricks Switch â¨â¨â¢ A great number of achievements to unblock through a wide range of challenges â¨â¨â¢ Several ramp combinations and obstacles to overcome â¨â¨â¢ New packets with new ramp combinations are yet to come, like loops, Vert ramps, corkscrews and more â¨â¨â¢ OpenFeint and LeaderboardsFor more information: www.bbdreamland.com

reviews.title: Amazing free game
reviews.comment: Looks simple but deceptively challenging. Looks pretty, fun and lots of levels. One of the best free games i have played. Update: promised updates no where to be seen. What a let down.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ForeClose
reviews.comment: im a fan of skateboarding, i\'ve expected so much into this game that the time i saw this it\'ll make my life be awesome but then again i also realize that the developer is seem to let go of the obligation with the app i\'ve been checking this althrough out. tried and tried to reinstall this unfortunately it always  forecloses yet again and again. for the millions who want this to play please will you fix this problem.
reviews.author: Martin Paolo Samson

reviews.title: ddok
reviews.comment: Awesome graphics, cool levels and easy controls! Really fun to play with!
reviews.author: Doyle See

reviews.title: Great game, but won\'t let me access my purchases or rebuy them
reviews.comment: I love the game.  However, it won\'t let me access my prior purchases for instant super trick or double score.  Is be happy to buy them again, it just needs to get fixed.  Says I already bought them, but won\'t let me access them.  Great game tho. I love it.
reviews.author: Daniel Conners

reviews.title: Game suck don\'t download
reviews.comment: Am sure they are not going to show but how can bob put his name on a game that levels to hard and have to pay for so much for free!!!!!
